rj_geometry::Point  start = rj_geometry::Point(0, 0),

rj_geometry::Point  min_dist = rj_geometry::Point(0.001,                                                                     0.001),
float  reflection_coeff = 1,

inline

Creates a Nelder-Mead 2D Config

Parameters
fstd function pointer which returns F(X, Y)
startstarting point of the simplex (Triangle in 2D Case)
stepstarting step magnitudes in X, Y directions
min_distminimum distance of bounding box before exit
reflection_coeffperecent to reflect by in the oposite direction Must be greater than 0
expansion_coeffpercent to extend single point by Must be greater than 1
contraction_coeffpercent to contract single point by Must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 0.5
shrink_coeffpercent to shrink all points by Must be between 0 and 1
max_iterationsmaximum number of iterations to reach before end
max_valuemax value to exit early at
max_threshthreshold for the max vlaue before exit
Note
Set max_value = max_thresh to disable
